import React from 'react'; import Services from '../../api/service' import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { Fade } from "react-awesome-reveal"; import sIcon from '../../images/icon/arrow-black.svg' import hIcon from '../../images/icon/ser-01.svg' import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next'; import { dataServices } from './dataServices'; const ServiceSection = (props) => { const ClickHandler = () => { window.scrollTo(10, 0); } const {t} = useTranslation() return (
Feature-services

{t("servicesSection.title")}
{t("servicesSection.title2")}

SEO services boost visibility and organic traffic, driving leads and growth.
View more services
{dataServices.map((service, srv) => (
{service.title ?

{service.title}

{service.description}
: ''}
))}
{Services.slice(3, 6).map((service, srv) => (
{service.title ?

{service.title}

{service.description}
: ''}
))}
); } export default ServiceSection;
